pkgmetadata.longdescription: Some Information-Theoretic Functions in the 'Tidy' Style // A frontend to the Shannon entropy, conditional Shannon entropy, and mutual information calculations provided by the 'infotheo' package. See Cover and Thomas (2001) doi:10.1002/0471200611 for an explanation of these measures. Also provides a convenient heatmap to compare more than two columns in a pairwise fashion.
